water heater corrosion.result: ⚠️🛑 Action Item: Water heater shows corrosion. Recommend replacement or further inspection for H&S risk.

vermiculate insulation.result: ⚠️🛑 Action Item: Suspected vermiculite present. Do not disturb or depressurize home (blower door) until tested and cleared. Potential asbestos hazard — defer project under IHWAP health and safety protocol.

rim joist unsealed.result: ⚠️ Action Item: Rim joist is unsealed. Recommend air sealing and insulating per IHWAP standards.

pipe insulation too close to flue.result: ⚠️🛑 Action Item: Foam or polyethylene pipe wrap is too close to combustion flue. Remove or rewrap using fire-rated fiberglass or install a rigid barrier. Non-compliant with combustion clearance codes.

open electrical panel.result: ⚠️🛑 Action Item: Open or exposed electrical components detected. Requires licensed electrician before weatherization can proceed.

ceiling collapse.result: ⚠️🛑 Action Item: Structural ceiling failure observed. Defer until roof and interior framing are stabilized.

mold.result: ⚠️🛑 Action Item: Mold-like substance observed. Requires source control and professional assessment before any air sealing or insulation. Defer project under IHWAP Health and Safety protocol.

flue disconnected.result: ⚠️🛑 Action Item: Combustion flue appears disconnected. Stop work and defer until HVAC or plumbing contractor corrects venting. Life safety hazard.

vent fan disconnected.result: ⚠️🛑 Action Item: Bathroom or kitchen vent fan terminates into attic or crawlspace. Install proper exterior termination to prevent moisture buildup.

duct leak.result: ⚠️ Action Item: Unsealed ductwork detected. Include duct sealing and airflow testing in HVAC scope.

attic insulation missing.result: ⚠️ Action Item: Attic appears underinsulated or bare. Recommend full R-49 fill with air sealing as part of weatherization scope.

sump pump present.result: ✅ Sump pump present. If functional, note as moisture mitigation. No action needed.

vapor barrier intact.result: ✅ Crawlspace vapor barrier intact and sealed. No action needed.

sealed rim joist.result: ✅ Rim joist appears properly sealed and insulated.

attic insulation complete.result: ✅ Attic shows full insulation coverage with depth markers.

smoke detector installed.result: ✅ Smoke detector visible. Meets IHWAP safety standard.

co detector present.result: ✅ CO detector present in conditioned zone. Pass.

minor corrosion only.result: ⚠️ Action Item: Minor corrosion noted. Monitor or include in cleanup scope as appropriate.

float switch present.result: ✅ Float switch detected near sump or HVAC system. Good moisture safeguard.

electrical hazard.result: ⚠️🛑 Action Item: Potential electrical hazard detected. Flag for contractor inspection. Defer work until corrected.

missing t&p pipe.result: ⚠️ Action Item: Water heater lacks discharge pipe on T&P valve. Required for compliance. Add to scope.

greenhouse attached.result: ⚠️🛑 Action Item: Attached sunroom or greenhouse may affect thermal envelope. Verify if it is open to conditioned space and adjust energy model accordingly.

crawlspace exposed wiring.result: ⚠️🛑 Action Item: Unsecured electrical wiring detected in crawlspace. Refer to licensed contractor. Defer project until hazard is corrected.

blower door test ready.result: ✅ Visual envelope appears prepped for blower door. Proceed unless deferred.
